text: Arpit Narechania and Adam Coscia presented posters at the 2023 Georgia Tech Career, Research, and Innovation Development Conference. They won travel awards!
Arpit Narechania, Grace Guo, and Adam Coscia presented at the annual GVU research showcase.
Our lab attended the IEEE VIS 2022 conference in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma, USA!
Grace Guo presented her research at the Doctoral Colloquium.
Arpit Narechania presented "Facilitating Conversational Interaction in Natural Language Interfaces for Visualization".
Grace Guo and Adam Coscia presented their work at a meeting of the NSF AI Institute for Adult Learning and Online Education (AI-ALOE).
